name: Battlestations!
description:
You control a special experimental robot, you goal is to survive all 32 rounds of enemy swarms, each round you have the ability to upgrade yourself. In your possession aside from a gun, special abilities, but be careful as they tend to overload if used too often. Though these overloads could sometimes be helpful...

To buy perks or spells, click on the icons.

If icons are too big, then reload the page and immediately before you start the game open it on fullscreen
